## Introduction

## Minimize package conflicts

Step 1: Download latest miniconda distribution and install

Step 2: Setup conda in base platform
	conda config --add channels conda-forge
	conda config --show channels (Ensure no defaults)
	conda config --env --set channel_priority strict
	conda update conda

Step 3: Create new environment for installation
	conda create --name da_base --clone base


conda env create -f environment.yml

conda install 

conda pack -n <environment_name>


## Checking on open-source python packages security

SCA (Software Component Analysis)


https://snyk.io/advisor/check/python

Reference link for details: https://docs.snyk.io/snyk-cli/scan-and-maintain-projects-using-the-cli/snyk-cli-for-open-source

Step 1: Go to this page https://snyk.io/product/open-source-security-management/, scroll down and click start free with Google or Github

Step 2: Login and follow the codes to install snyk.exe

Step 3: Go to conda environment setup after packing and run command:

pip list --format=freeze > requirements.txt

Step 4: Copy the snyk.exe file to the folder

Step 5: In the CLI run snyk test
